  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Food digestion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelverdauung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Digestion de nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Digestão do alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Digestione dell'alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέψη τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Digestión del alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates how food is processed during digestion. It involves the use of enzymes to break the chemical links of food molecules before they are passed into the blood.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digestive enzymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular chemical links</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soluble food molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie Nahrung während der 
Verdauung verarbeitet wird. Es bezieht den Gebrauch der Enzyme 
mit ein, die chemischen Links der Nahrungsmittelmoleküle zu brechen, 
bevor sie in das Blut geführt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre comment la nourriture est 
transformée pendant la digestion. Il comporte l'utilisation des
enzymes de casser les liens chimiques des molécules de nourriture 
avant qu'ils soient passés dans le sang.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra como o alimento é 
processado durante a digestão. Envolve o uso dos enzymes 
quebrar as ligações químicas de moléculas do alimento antes que 
estejam passadas no sangue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra come l'alimento è 
trasformato durante la digestione. Coinvolge l'uso degli enzimi 
rompere i collegamenti chimici delle molecole dell'alimento prima che 
siano passati nell'anima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει πώς τα τρόφιμα 
υποβάλλονται σε επεξεργασία κατά τη διάρκεια της πέψης. 
Περιλαμβάνει τη χρήση των ενζύμων για να σπάσει τις χημικές
συνδέσεις των μορίων τροφίμων προτού να περάσουν τα στο αίμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra cómo el alimento se 
procesa durante la digestión. Implica el uso de enzimas de 
romper las conexiones químicas de las moléculas del alimento antes 
de que se pasen en la sangre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blut</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verdauungsfördernde Enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">molekulare chemische Links</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lösliche Nahrungsmittelmoleküle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enzymes digestives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liens chimiques moléculaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécules solubles de nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Digestão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enzymes digestivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ligações químicas molecular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moléculas soluble do alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Digestione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">enzimi digestivi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">collegamenti chimici molecolari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecole solubili dell'alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίμα</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλυτά μόρια τροφίμων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sangre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
